name: dropkickpikachu
text: With Karl Lagerfeld makes this one.

name: aperson
text: Lagerfeld all processing down a row of mocked up chatsacks. Lagerfeld purses his lips, shakes head, waves finger dismissively. His eyes alight on his favourite, and with a nod to an underling, the wheels of production are set in motion.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: Why this comment isn't getting more chubbies than mine is beyond me.

name: charchar
text: Chubbied for humility.  You are an admirable being, dropkickpikachu.

name: aperson
text:
V-chub.
(those weren't even invented 5 months ago). Ah knuckleheads from the day...

name: spinynorman
text: Which is an odd choice, because there's a bad Lance Armstrong joke lurking around in this strip for sure.

name: nigelchaos
text: That's what I was waiting for!

name: fuzzyshoo
text: And yet here it is!

name: craigola
text: Karl Lagerfeld is the one with the fan, right?

name: dejavroom
text: dual-ball base model makes it a 5

name: hellofyellin
text: Onstad draws a mighty fine cat's paw holding a sac-phone.

name: twohundredninety
text: Ray imagines that he might end a call because there are three fake testicles hanging from his phone.

name: whuppins
text:
"Can't talk now, bro. I'm three-ballin'."

I use that all the time, all the time

How is this arc not rated any higher? I think the people giving the low ratings don't realize that this is making fun of an actual product that people actually buy and put on their cars.

name: epicurus
text: You use THAT all the time? What are you, me?

name: soticoto
text:
Because despite its awesomeness... it doesn't have Philippe, Vlad nor Cartilage-Head.

You have to maintain a sense of subjectivity here.

name: the_doz
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: apricotta
text:
Wait, you mean this is an actual product and people actually buy it?

Oh, sorry, I just repeated your sentence. I'm European, I catch on some American marketing trends rather slowly...

name: tekende
text: Is the usual response "What?"

name: philophobe
text: Agree with me, friend, that the target demographic for Ana-Tomix calls everyone 'bro', regardless of gender or social context.

name: stubob
text: These new ChatSacks are SICK bro!

name: featurelessvoid
text: 5 for "the market demands non-linear value."

name: clembot
text: "Interestingly, no." as if he did research that revealed the fact about non-linear value. Classic ray

name: clembot
text: anyone else notice that the base model and the triple-play have pubes, but the Solo has a pornstar cut?

name: nathanielperson
text: Good eye.

name: wae
text: now THAT is some non-linear value. but it would be cool if they could do some value in the shape of a star or hitler's mustache, too.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Um... I don't see any pubes there.

name: pwb
text: A comment left by pwb was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, mattfish, iidebaser, STUART)

name: i_love_kate
text: If those are pubes, they are hella scarce.

name: i_love_kate
text:
Oh, wait, you fools. They don't mean those lines, they mean the black patches where they connect to the handheld.

How could you drag me down with you like that.

name: mattfish
text: I think everybody's wrong; the black bit where they attach looks like just a little lanyard loop hole, whereas the place the Solo attaches looks more like sewn leather, like a baseball. Luxury items do sewn leather all the time.

name: liithe
text: I thought it was just an empty "hole" where you attach your favorite set of balls. That would make the single-ball model hanging from a pursed... No, you're right.

name: cheeks_jd
text: Everyones got their first strip. This is mine. You can see what I thought Achewood was going to be like.

name: gompo
text: Completely fucking awesome?

name: choosebro
text: I'm mega jealous of all you chaps, with your "first strips." I do not remember the first strip of achewood that I read. I don't have a certain special one all for myself.

name: mugi
text: I started at the first one, after being referred here by a friend.

name: dj_insomniac
text: I started at the first one, after being referred here by Freezepop. Sadly, I do not know them personally.

name: alzuna
text: I'm going to third that, I started at the first one too.

name: jollysaintpete
text:
my first strip was the one about the book..."THEN HOW COME YOU SOLD YOUR EYES?!"

so great.

name: red-barchetta
text: I saw the one where Todd is doing coke at Phillipes birthday party and it led me here. The rest is from.....history!

name: timasi
text: I... I would buy this.

name: pez
text: use of this phone requires nuts to be in a extremely close proximity to your chin

name: blarghamagarky
text: I used to do it with a dude who only ever had one ball

name: bovine
text: and here you are thinking you have nothing in common with Eva Braun.

name: blarghamagarky
text: I don't know how that makes me feel.

name: bovine
text: if you're anything like me, it must be an unholy melange of FEAR and AROUSAL.

name: blarghamagarky
text: Thank you for properly articulating my emotions

name: bovine
text: so what are we naming our first child? i'm thinking Millicent for a girl, and Lozenge for a boy.

name: blarghamagarky
text:
I don't get it.


You're weird.

name: bovine
text: Lozenge is ancient Gaelic for 'he who walks unbeknownst  into streetposts.' Fitting because there is a reasonable chance our boy would be retarded. (born near Chernobyl)

name: blarghamagarky
text: stop it

name: bovine
text: jeez. its just the INTERNET.

name: xiaomimi
text: That was awesome you guys!

name: kamet
text: That was actually really fucking funny.

name: dj_insomniac
text: I think the funniest part is that bovine is listed as Female to blarghamagarky's Dame, and therefore their chance of having children is slim to none, even if it weren't the Internet.

name: mangtastic
text: This is no longer the case, as Bovine is now listed as Male.

name: mangtastic
text: Sex-change?

name: joestork
text: What makes this for me is the way Todd is totally rapt in attention, just hanging off every word Ray says.  "F-F-Four Balls?!"  You can feel his mind exploding.  (yes, just like in that strip from the awful Todd talkshow arc.  Wait, did I say awful?  I meant... aw shit, the game is up)

name: fattypneumonia
text:
Good call. Todd is in waaaay over his skis in this meeting:

"Yeah! Yeah! 'Course!"
"Huh!"

He hasn't a fuckin' clue what Ray's on about, does he? He just wanted six million bucks, and now it's all this ...

name: direhaggis
text: Manchy kabook noonee Solo.

name: sncether
text:
For about three months, Han Solo's carbonite tomb featured a dangling chatsack in the obvious place.

" Wermo sleemo parchee Chatsack! Ho Ho Ho Ho. "

Then Greedo was found with them in his creepy tube-mouth and Jabba decided to move them to the tailpipe of his sail barge. You can just make them out on the laserdisc version of Return of the Jedi .

name: cracklewater
text: I adore Ray's fingernail-style claws.

name: spicyponyhead
text: Have you never seen a real live cat before?

name: cracklewater
text:
Maybe. They're the ones that go 'meow', right?

The ones with retractable claws, instead of fixed nails, as depicted in the strip?

Maybe you're thinking of dogs?

name: ryanfuss
text: "And i'm Threeeee! Threeballin!"

name: usversusthem
text: ( Yeah I'm Three! Three-ballin'! )

name: andrewthepig
text: Somebody had to, right?

name: erinye
text:
I am so angry that you beat me to this.

(not really)
